titleStmt.title: The plain man's guide to heaven containing his duty 1. Towards God. II. Towards his neighbour. With proper prayers, meditations, and ejaculations, designed chiefly for the countryman, trades-man, labourer, and such like.
titleStmt.author: Lucas, Richard, 1648-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Richard Lucas.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
